title: Scalable Multi-Tenant Platform
requirement:
Design a robust multi-tenant framework that ensures data isolation, supports tenant-specific customizations, and provides efficient resource allocation.  
#### Screens:  
Admin panel for onboarding and managing restaurant partners, settings page for tenant-specific configurations, and resource management dashboard.  
#### Personas:  
IT administrators setting up new tenants, operations managers monitoring performance, and developers customizing tenant-specific features.
